p: Nature and biodiversity are under threat. The restoration and protection of biodiversity, however, can be an action that governments take as they come through the Covid‐19 pandemic. The EU, for instance, has a 10‐year plan to protect at least 30 per cent of EU land and seas by 2030. As an ambassador for the Campaign for Nature I want to see this target taken up around the world to secure a better future for the planet, its wildlife and ourselves.
